page.title: 01MILTON ABBAS - W.WHITECHURCH
page.content: The area covered by the survey is in the postal area of Dorchester, the County town of Dorset. The area is almost completely agricultural land with the two villages of Milton Abbas with a population of approximately 900 and Winterborne Whitechurch with a population of 650. There are eleven farms of varying size in the area with the main emphasis on cultivated fields growing barley and wheat with some root crops for animal fodder together with a minor dairy and beef cattle interest. This is an excellent area for the tourist with so much of historical, architectural and natural interest and beauty within a small area. The local inns and Caravan park are popular with local folk and with the tourist.
